**精灵盾**（elven shield）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[盾牌](/wiki/%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C "盾牌")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[木头](/index.php?title=%E6%9C%A8%E5%A4%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "木头 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观为**蓝绿盾**（blue and green shield）。

[ ]

## 生成

[精灵](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（起始种族） (page does not exist)")族的角色在游戏开始时即鉴定精灵盾。

非[亡灵](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%A1%E7%81%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "亡灵 (page does not exist)")的[精灵](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E5%B1%9E%E6%80%A7%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（怪物属性） (page does not exist)")族怪物生成时有5⁄12的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一面精灵盾[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

## 描述

精灵盾的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为2。和其他[精灵族防具](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E6%97%8F%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵族防具 (page does not exist)")一样，精灵盾在附魔值不大于+5的情况下都可以安全地[附魔](/index.php?title=%E9%99%84%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "附魔 (page does not exist)")。

## 策略

精灵盾的重量仅有40 [aum](/index.php?title=Aum/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Aum/zh-CN (page does not exist)")，是游戏中AC加成为2的盾牌中最轻的，因此对于绝大多数角色而言都是前期最实用的盾牌（[女武神](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%B3%E6%AD%A6%E7%A5%9E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "女武神 (page does not exist)")除外，因为她们开局就有+3的[小盾牌](/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C "小盾牌")），也是游戏中除[反射之盾](/wiki/%E5%8F%8D%E5%B0%84%E4%B9%8B%E7%9B%BE "反射之盾")外最实用的盾牌。不过，它由木头制成，因此会因为烧焦或腐烂而受到[侵蚀](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%B5%E8%9A%80\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侵蚀 (page does not exist)")。如果你的角色已经有其他反射来源了，那么精灵盾就是盾牌的最优选择，因为它拥有比其他盾牌更高的安全附魔值上限。

## 历史

精灵盾最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Elven_shield/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Some variants may give elves (including the player) an AC bonus for wearing an elven shield.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") an elven shield will produce either an [orcish shield](/wiki/Orcish_shield "Orcish shield") or an [Uruk-hai shield](/wiki/Uruk-hai_shield "Uruk-hai shield"), with an equal chance of each item; upgrading an orcish shield or Uruk-hai shield will produce an elven shield.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), elven shields grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including [elven](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)") players.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), an elven shield grants 2 AC, 0 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and [MC](/wiki/MC "MC")2 when worn, and its weight is reduced to 30 aum.

[The Shield of Yggdrasil](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#The_Shield_of_Yggdrasil "DNetHack artifacts") is an unaligned [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") elven shield that favors elves. It grants [regeneration](/wiki/Regeneration "Regeneration") and [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance") while worn, and can be safely enchanted to +7. [Invoking](/wiki/Invoking "Invoking") The Shield of Yggdrasil heals you in a similar manner to [The Staff of Aesculapius](/wiki/The_Staff_of_Aesculapius "The Staff of Aesculapius").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), elven shields grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players. Elven [Knights](/wiki/Knight "Knight") start the game with an elven shield; [hobbits](/wiki/Hobbit_\(starting_race\) "Hobbit (starting race)") are an additional race that start the game with knowledge of their appearance. Elven [mercenaries](/wiki/Mercenaries "Mercenaries") can generate with elven shields.

An elven shield can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a small shield and an [elven dagger](/wiki/Elven_dagger "Elven dagger"); [chain mail](/wiki/Chain_mail "Chain mail") can be combined with an elven shield to create [elven chain mail](/wiki/Elven_chain_mail "Elven chain mail").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), elven [Paladins](/wiki/Paladin_\(role\) "Paladin (role)"), Priests and [Warriors](/wiki/Warrior_\(role\) "Warrior (role)") start the game with an elven shield in place of the role's standard small shield. [Pookas](/wiki/Pooka "Pooka") have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with an elven shield.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), elven shields grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players.

Upgrading a small shield will produce an elven shield, and vice versa. Elven Knights start with a small shield instead of an elven shield, which they can upgrade to easily - all other details from EvilHack are applicable.

## 引用及注释

精灵盾（elven shield）是NetHack中的一种盾牌类防具。它由木头制成，未鉴定时外观为蓝绿盾（blue and green shield）。

生成

精灵族的角色在游戏开始时即鉴定精灵盾。

非亡灵的精灵族怪物生成时有5⁄12的概率获得一面精灵盾[1]。

描述

精灵盾的基础AC加成为2。和其他精灵族防具一样，精灵盾在附魔值不大于+5的情况下都可以安全地附魔。

策略

精灵盾的重量仅有40 aum，是游戏中AC加成为2的盾牌中最轻的，因此对于绝大多数角色而言都是前期最实用的盾牌（女武神除外，因为她们开局就有+3的小盾牌），也是游戏中除反射之盾外最实用的盾牌。不过，它由木头制成，因此会因为烧焦或腐烂而受到侵蚀。如果你的角色已经有其他反射来源了，那么精灵盾就是盾牌的最优选择，因为它拥有比其他盾牌更高的安全附魔值上限。

历史

精灵盾最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

Some variants may give elves (including the player) an AC bonus for wearing an elven shield.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, upgrading an elven shield will produce either an orcish shield or an Uruk-hai shield, with an equal chance of each item; upgrading an orcish shield or Uruk-hai shield will produce an elven shield.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, elven shields grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, an elven shield grants 2 AC, 0 DR and MC2 when worn, and its weight is reduced to 30 aum.

The Shield of Yggdrasil is an unaligned artifact elven shield that favors elves. It grants regeneration and poison resistance while worn, and can be safely enchanted to +7. Invoking The Shield of Yggdrasil heals you in a similar manner to The Staff of Aesculapius.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, elven shields grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players. Elven Knights start the game with an elven shield; hobbits are an additional race that start the game with knowledge of their appearance. Elven mercenaries can generate with elven shields.

An elven shield can be created at a forge by combining a small shield and an elven dagger; chain mail can be combined with an elven shield to create elven chain mail.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, elven Paladins, Priests and Warriors start the game with an elven shield in place of the role's standard small shield. Pookas have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with an elven shield.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, elven shields grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players.

Upgrading a small shield will produce an elven shield, and vice versa. Elven Knights start with a small shield instead of an elven shield, which they can upgrade to easily - all other details from EvilHack are applicable.
